snippet: The board of the struggling automaker has approved a plan to raise around 3 billion euros in fresh capital.
abstract: Struggling French automaker PSA Peugeot Citroen approves plan to issue about 3 billion euros in fresh capital by allowing Chinese automaker Dongfeng Motor and the French government to buy portion of the company's shares.

byline.original: By NEIL GOUGH and DAVID JOLLY

lead_paragraph: The board of the struggling automaker has approved a plan to raise around 3 billion euros in fresh capital.

headline.main: Chinese Firm and France to Buy Stakes in Peugeot
headline.print_headline: Chinese Company and France to Buy Stakes in Peugeot
